Title: Learn To Ride
Description: It's time for you to learn how to ride! Seek out Velma Warnam at Brill in Tirisfal Glades. Don't forget to buy your mount while you are there!
PortraitGiverText: Find Velma Warnam and learn how to ride a mount!
RewardText: Don't forget to buy your mount while you are here! You can buy one from Zachariah Post here.
